openai_prompt_template:
Extract all apartment listings from this Wix-based property website.

Each listing is in a repeater item with role='listitem' or class containing 'wixui-repeater__item'.

IMPORTANT:
- DO NOT extract navigation elements or buttons
- DO NOT extract contact forms or modal dialogs
- ONLY extract actual property listings with property names and details
- Each listing should have at least: title/address and bedroom info

HTML Content:
{html}

Return a JSON array of listing objects with these fields (use null if not found):
- listing_website
- title
- bedrooms
- bathrooms
- sqft
- price
- img_urls (array)
- full_address
- street
- city
- state
- neighborhood
- description
- available_date
- phone_contact
- email_contact
- apply_now_link

Return ONLY the JSON array, no other text.
